mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLE_MEMBER(MID, PASS, NAME, ZIPCODE, ADDR, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTH) VALUES (#{mid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pass, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth, jdbcType=DATE})
